#summary Instructions on adding a site to Sites.xml
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Introduction =
This document will cover the specifications for adding a site to the Sites.xml file included with mpNZB. This Sites.xml file contains everything needed to add a site that supports RSS.

= Notes =
  * `&` has to be replaced with `&amp;`
  * `GZIP` compressed RSS feeds are supported
  * `<feeds>`, `<groups>`, `<search>` and `<size>` can be removed when not needed

= Replacement Fields =
These fields will be replaced with the correct data automatically by mpNZB.

  * *`[MAX]`* = Maximum results per feed.
  * *`[GROUP]`* = Usenet group.
  * *`[QUERY]`* = Search string.

= Example Site =
{{{
<site name="Newzbin">
	<feeds>
		<feed name="Everything">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/everything/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Unknown">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/unknown/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Anime">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/anime/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Apps">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/apps/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Books">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/books/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Consoles">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/consoles/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Discussions">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/discussions/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Emulation">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/emulation/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Games">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/games/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Misc">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/misc/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Movies">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/movies/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Music">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/music/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="PDA">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/pda/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="Resources">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/resources/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
		<feed name="TV">http://www.newzbin.com/browse/category/p/tv/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</feed>
	</feeds>
	<groups>http://www.newzbin.com/browse/group/p/[GROUP]/?feed=rss&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]</groups>
	<search>http://www.newzbin.com/search/query/?q=[QUERY]&amp;searchaction=Search&amp;u_post_results_amt=[MAX]&amp;feed=rss</search>
	<item type="2">
		<title element="title" />
		<size type="2" element="report:size" />
		<url element="report:id" />
	</item>
</site>
}}}

== _Feeds_ ==
This section contains the sites RSS feeds.

{{{
<feeds>
        <feed name="(Name)">(URL)</feed>
</feeds>
}}}

  * *`(Name)`* = Name of RSS feed
  * *`(URL)`* = URL to the RSS feed
    * Optionally contain *`[MAX]`*

*Note:* `<feeds>` allows more than one `<feed>`

== _Group_ ==
This section contains the sites group feeds.

{{{
<groups>(URL)</groups>
}}}

  * *`(URL)`* = URL to the search feed.
    * Must contain *`[GROUP]`*
    * Optionally contain *`[MAX]`*

== _Search_ ==
This section contains the sites search feed.

{{{
<search>(URL)</search>
}}}

  * *`(URL)`* = URL to the search feed.
    * Must contain *`[QUERY]`*
    * Optionally contain *`[MAX]`*

== _Item_ ==
This section contains the data needed to parse the RSS.

{{{
<item type="(Type)">
        <title element="(Element)" />
        <size type="(Type)" element="(Element)">
                <regex input="(RegEx)" replacement="(RegEx)"/>
        </size>
        <url element="(Element)" />
</item>
}}}

  * *`(Type)`* = This identifies what method of downloading should be used
    * *item*
      * 1 = Link to NZB/ZIP
      * 2 = Newzbin ID
    * *size*
      * 1 = String
      * 2 = Bytes
  * *`(Element)`*
    * *title* = RSS element containing title information
    * *size* = RSS element containing size information
    * *url* = RSS element containing url information
  * *`(RegEx)`*
    * *input* = Input string for a regular expressions search
    * *replacement* = Replacement string for the *input* field
